meanings.definition: The mixing of all gene types in a population
meanings.sent1: Panmixia ensures that all gene types are mixed in a population.
meanings.sent2: The panmixia of genes in the population leads to genetic diversity.
meanings.sent3: At the genetic party, panmixia was the star of the show, blending all genes seamlessly.
meanings.sent4: In the melting pot of genetics, panmixia stirs the pot to create a diverse mix of genes.
meanings.sent5: The concept of panmixia can be likened to a genetic dance where all genes mingle freely.

meanings.definition: The state of being completely mixed or blended
meanings.sent1: The panmixia of flavors in the dish created a harmonious blend.
meanings.sent2: The artist achieved panmixia in the painting by blending colors seamlessly.
meanings.sent3: The panmixia of colors in the artwork made it visually appealing and cohesive.
meanings.sent4: The panmixia of scents in the room created a pleasant and inviting atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The seamless panmixia of ingredients in the recipe resulted in a delicious meal.
